- Add tests to prevent regressions in eval run times

createData.title: Resolve ingestion race by combining Grapevine search with Linear API to avoid duplicate tickets
createData.description:
Mitigate duplication during ambient extraction caused by ingestion lag.

- When searching for existing tickets, also query Linear API (not just Grapevine DB)
- Evaluate/augment existing 'top 20 most recent tickets' heuristic
- Target rapid Slack thread messages creating multiple duplicates
- Add tests and monitoring to validate reduction in duplicates

createData.title: Build quick UI/shortcut to log live artifacts as eval datapoints (needs decision)
createData.description:
Provide an easy way to convert a live artifact (Slack message, meeting, PR) into an eval datapoint.

- Single-click or shortcut from artifact to create eval record
- Capture current Linear board state and link expected outputs; ground truth may still need manual label
- Goal: speed up coverage of real-world issues for future regressions
- Status: undecided/proposed; confirm priority and owner before implementation
